name: Rocky Brands, Inc.
description: Rocky Brands, Inc. is a leading designer, manufacturer, and marketer of premium quality footwear and apparel for outdoor and work environments. Founded in 1932 and headquartered in Nelsonville, Ohio, the company has a rich history of producing durable and stylish products that cater to the needs of active consumers. Rocky Brands operates several well-known brands, including Rocky, Georgia Boot, Durango, and Lehigh, each targeting specific markets such as hiking, work, and casual wear. With a commitment to craftsmanship and innovation, Rocky Brands utilizes advanced materials and technologies to enhance comfort, performance, and durability in their products. The company’s mission is to create footwear and apparel that not only meet but exceed customer expectations, providing them with the confidence to pursue their adventures and careers. Rocky Brands also places a strong emphasis on sustainability and responsible sourcing, ensuring that their products are made with environmentally friendly practices. The company continues to evolve by embracing new trends and technologies in the footwear industry while maintaining its heritage of quality and performance.

seo.meta_title: Rocky Brands, Inc. | Premium Footwear and Apparel
seo.meta_description: Explore Rocky Brands, Inc., a leader in high-quality footwear and apparel for outdoor and work environments. Discover our commitment to innovation and sustainability.

faq.question: What does Rocky Brands specialize in?
faq.answer: Rocky Brands specializes in high-quality footwear and apparel for outdoor and work environments.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Rocky Brands?
faq.answer: David Sharp is the CEO of Rocky Brands, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Rocky Brands headquartered?
faq.answer: Rocky Brands is headquartered in Nelsonville, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: What are some of Rocky Brands' main products?
faq.answer: Rocky Brands' main products include hiking boots, work boots, jackets, and casual shoes.
